description.value:
The {type}'s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]{detect magic}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.IBJmWjzbQGu7M4UX]{fog cloud}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Bnn9Nzajixvow9xi]{light}

3/day each: @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.pub0OWVEB71XQx1n]{feather fall}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t]{fly}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.wqfAVANuQonNBgnL]{misty step}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.HQfd7jJyULIoGxrZ]{telekinesis}

1/day each: @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.ZPd73HtKF3At11jh]{control weather}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.2IWiZAJtOGDoKjiz]{gaseous form}
